amendment.description: An amendment numbered 61 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the State Department from using taxpayer funds to send employees to any event or conference hosted by the Clinton Global Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 215 (Roll no. 486).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 215 (Roll no. 486).
